alert.note: Alert for Okeechobee; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 30 at 2:46AM EST until January 30 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning early this morning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 25 degrees. For the Freeze Warning tonight into Monday morning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 degrees. * WHERE...Osceola and Okeechobee Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 9 AM this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 8 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
